EmailTemplate.description: 02/12/2013 Year 7 Charity Stall - EFC Christmas Bazaar
EmailTemplate.name: 02/12/2013 Year 7 Charity Stall - EFC Christmas Bazaar
EmailTemplate.subject: Year 7 Charity Stall - EFC Christmas Bazaar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Year 7 will be selling children's books, second-hand toys and games on their stall next Monday at the EFC Christmas Bazaar.
In order to do so, we are relying on pupils to bring in their unwanted children's books, toys and games this week. Please kindly deposit any offerings at either the Primary or Secondary reception area.
Many thanks in advance for your support.
Regards, Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
